channel.title: Updating
channel.description:
For a 2d game that uses keys to move instead of mouseclicking, what should be used to keep the main process loop on time (idk what to call it), like how runescape uses something to update every 600ms or something? I was going to use a Java.util.Timer but according to this: [url=http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/util/Timer.html]http://docs.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/util/Timer.html[/url]
it sais that it "doesn't offer real-time guarantees" so what should I use instead? Or did I misunderstand something?
